sentences.sContent: Aspirin can ulcerate the stomach lining.
sentences.sCn: 阿司匹林能造成胃壁溃。

sentences.sContent: In advanced stages the opaque corneas may ulcerate and even perforate.
sentences.sContent_eng: In advanced stages the opaque corneas may ulcerate and even perforate.
sentences.sCn: 在疾病后期，不透明的角膜可能产生溃疡，甚至穿孔。

sentences.sContent: Objective: To observe the effect of the rhubarb powder compound in the treatment of ulcerate colonitis.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective: To observe the effect of the rhubarb powder compound in the treatment of ulcerate colonitis.
sentences.sCn: 目的：探讨复方大黄粉治疗溃疡性结肠炎临床疗效。

words.tran: [病理] 溃疡；腐烂物；道德败坏
溃疡；[病理] 溃疡形成
溃烂（ulcerate的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to form an ulcer, or become covered with ulcers
